Review Title: The quality of the product and the after sale service is very much poor
Review Text: i rarely used the laptop, hardly 3-4 times.One day only i have taken it to my office and came back, ( it was properly carried in the bag), next day i found it developed a crack on the screen , i strongly believe that a minor crack may be there originally which developed subsequently when i carried the laptop.(laptop is for carrying know, otherwise i would have purchased a desktop) When i contacted customer care , they told it will not be covered under warranty ( i have taken Rs 4000 cost extended warranty also). i have contacted the authorised service centres as provided by the customer care of Lenovo , but they denied the service of the product , telling that they dont do for LAPTOPS, they are for mobiles only. i escalated the issue again with customer care , and all those support centre i contacted replied same. Even after 2 months i am not able to replace the screen. I felt the service as unethical and unsupported. I will never recommend the  product to anyone else

Product Title: Lenovo Ideapad 330 Intel Core i5 8th Gen 15.6-inch Laptop (8GB RAM/2TB HDD/2GB Graphics/Windows 10 Home/Onyx Black/ 2.2kg), 81DE012NIN
Review Title: Great value laptop with minor caveat
Review Text: I purchased this laptop for the purpose of browsing the internet, minor content creation (writing papers for college), and some media consumption (streaming video). This laptop has delivered on all of these objectives. However, the one caveat is this: the laptop comes with a 1 TB mechanical hard drive that is clearly the bottleneck of this system. I replaced this hard drive within a few weeks of purchasing this laptop due to debilitating performance. I installed a value priced solid state hard drive from a major manufacturer and the performance of this laptop was instantly improved. I would not recommend this laptop unless you plan to replace the hard drive with an SSD. Thankfully the laptop has a very convenient M.2 slot for newer SSD's.

Product Title: Lenovo Ideapad 330 Intel Core i5 8th Gen 15.6-inch Laptop (8GB RAM/2TB HDD/2GB Graphics/Windows 10 Home/Onyx Black/ 2.2kg), 81DE012NIN
Review Title: High bootup time and slow performance
Review Text:
Very high bootup time of over 4-5 mins.
HDD is of low quality and disk read/writes slow the laptop considerably. Screen is anti glare which is useful feature, but somehow does not have rich colors and the display looks dull.Battery life of 3 hours seems good.It has dedicated partition for windows-10 installation image, so to recover or reinstall windows if something goes wrong is just a press of a reset button. Came with 1 year Macafee antivirus subscription.
Few things good, but it lacks what matters the most - performance and reliability.

Could have been much better if Lenovo inserted a 250 gb ssd instead of 2tb hard drive.

Product Title: Lenovo Ideapad 330 Intel Core i5 8th Gen 15.6-inch Laptop (8GB RAM/2TB HDD/2GB Graphics/Windows 10 Home/Onyx Black/ 2.2kg), 81DE012NIN
Review Text:
After a long days waiting amazon finally delivered my product. Then on it's first day I found that battery was totally 0% . Then on the first day it was hanged too. I was really disappointed. But then it all was going nice. Everything is  nice bt camera quality is poor.
Bt after 1 months of using this one keypad switch was partially broken and also the camera quality got much poor than the previous one. I called lenovo Customer care bt they said that this camera quality is normal and the damage of keypad switch is not in my warranty. So they can't do anything.
So why does lenovo give such poor quality keypad ?!
Anyway overall this product is not bad as compared to the price.

Product Title: Lenovo Ideapad 330 Intel Core i5 8th Gen 15.6-inch Laptop (8GB RAM/2TB HDD/2GB Graphics/Windows 10 Home/Onyx Black/ 2.2kg), 81DE012NIN
Review Title: Wrong Specification, But Lenovo and Prime Day saved me big time.
Review Text:
I was very happy when I purchased thinking that it is Full HD that is 1920 x 1080. But as soon as I got to know that it is just HD 1366x768. It was a shock to me.
Generally I dont prefer buying a product on launching without knowing its review, I just tried it on first time and its paid off badly.
But the trust I had on Lenovo product saved me.
The laptop is stylish with good finishing.
It is less weight and 180 degree hinge is nice.
All Hardware configuration is Awesome.
Dolby sound is good. I like the keypad and touchpad superb.
setup is easy with windows 10. it has 1 year McAfee subscription which is a surprise.
Finally with the Prime Day benefit I got 15% discount on the price of 45K which is great.
So it is worth the money.
I yet to check the performance with heavy software or game. I will check and let you know guys.

Product Title: Lenovo Ideapad 330 Intel Core i5 8th Gen 15.6-inch Laptop (8GB RAM/2TB HDD/2GB Graphics/Windows 10 Home/Onyx Black/ 2.2kg), 81DE012NIN
Review Text:
Laptop -its fine in working
Screen is very dull in starting but everything would fine after explore the Lenovo vintage
Battery drain so fast only 4hr backup but there are many modes you can enhance your performance or save battery upto 10hrs
And not full HD resolution but I say now it's contrast is as good as fhd laptop
Not very much satisfied in starting but now I am satisfied in this range
it's good in this range
And it is registered from lenovo warranty care so it is a genuine piece .
Thanks Lenovo .

Product Title: Lenovo Ideapad 330 Intel Core i5 8th Gen 15.6-inch Laptop (8GB RAM/2TB HDD/2GB Graphics/Windows 10 Home/Onyx Black/ 2.2kg), 81DE012NIN
Review Text:
Brought the product based on the specs highlighted. However, wrong description was given regarding the screen resolution. It was marketed as having FHD (1920 x 1080), but actual product has only1366x768.
Original price also shown as ₹62,290.00 (And around 44k on prime day). But according to Lenovo's site, the product is priced at ₹53,099 with FHD.
Highly disappointed.

Product Title: Lenovo Ideapad 330 Intel Core i5 8th Gen 15.6-inch Laptop (8GB RAM/2TB HDD/2GB Graphics/Windows 10 Home/Onyx Black/ 2.2kg), 81DE012NIN
Review Title: Good product - its NOT Full HD as mentioned by Amazon !
Review Text:
Based on the specs mentioned I bought this one.
all the specification match except the screen resolution which is a let down.
wrong description was given regarding the screen resolution. It was clearly mentioned  as having FHD (1920 x 1080), but actual product has only1366x768.
Hope Amazon replaces the product with correct Resolution.
I need replacement and not Refund.

Product Title: Lenovo Ideapad 330 Intel Core i5 8th Gen 15.6-inch Laptop (8GB RAM/2TB HDD/2GB Graphics/Windows 10 Home/Onyx Black/ 2.2kg), 81DE012NIN
Review Text: Very happy with the product and the performance so far

Product Title: Lenovo Ideapad 330 Intel Core i5 8th Gen 15.6-inch Laptop (8GB RAM/2TB HDD/2GB Graphics/Windows 10 Home/Onyx Black/ 2.2kg), 81DE012NIN
Review Title: Laptop is light and has powerful configuration, worth to buy in exchange offer.
Review Text:
Laptop appears to be nice and performance looks to be okay.
Some of the features are misleading like FULL HD.
Laptop is light weight and hinges are durable. There is one year MaCafee free antivirus subscription so don't buy Antivirus separately. Microsoft Office is not available, only free one month trial.
Heating could be an issue, as fans are not on side of the laptop.
Touchpad is sensitive and sound is also OK, not that loud. I bought this for 35k, which is a pretty good price for the hardware configuration.

Product Title: Lenovo Ideapad 330 Intel Core i5 8th Gen 15.6-inch Laptop (8GB RAM/2TB HDD/2GB Graphics/Windows 10 Home/Onyx Black/ 2.2kg), 81DE012NIN
Review Text:
Purchased this on Prime day at a discount of Rs 3250. Price was Rs 44990.
The product became unavailable the next day.
The screen is only HD (1366x768) not FHD (1920x1080). Amazon has mentioned this wrong.
Won't recommend this model, go for FHD one.
